item.title: Introducing Gocoin-cash
item.description: Gocoin-cash is a Bitcoin Cash fork of Gocoin, a full node solution written in Go language (golang) and is based on the original work of Gocoin by Piotr Narewski.

item.title: About Gocoin-cash
item.description: Gocoin-cash is a Bitcoin Cash client written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Gocoin Siphash Learn more and contribute on GitHub. Hugo Website Some fun facts about Hugo: Built in Go Loosely inspired by Jekyll Primarily developed by spf13 on the train while commuting to and from Manhattan. Coded in Vim using spf13-vim Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub or ask us on Twitter.
